description:
Forbes Law Offices PLLC handles a wide range of legal matters: from highly personal injuries to technical procedures for governments and businesses. Our law firm has offices in Charleston, West Virginia, from which we serve the entirety of the Kanawha County area.

Wide practice

We handle a variety of disputes at our law firm. These include personal injury, such as car accidents, medical malpractice and truck accidents; criminal defense, such as drunk driving, drug charges and white collar crime; domestic violence; and business, municipal and commercial law. We also help victims of child sexual abuse pursue damages under West Virginia's extended statute of limitations.

Reputable attorneys

The founder of our law firm, Attorney William C. 'Bill' Forbes, has three decades of experience as a trial lawyer. He was Kanawha County’s prosecuting attorney for 12 years. He has served in the leadership of several professional organizations and has taught at West Virginia State University. He has also had multiple high-profile television features, including an interview with Ed Bradley on CBS's 60 Minutes.

Attorney W. Jesse Forbes is also a preeminent member of the West Virginia legal community. He has multiple professional accolades and a successful case history. He has also served on various committees and boards.

Forbes Law Offices PLLC is a true Kanawha County firm with a famous, experienced attorney at the helm. Free consultations are available.
